title: P22 Holiday sale extended to Typophile community
content:
—  
Great typographic holiday gifts on sale until December 15th including:

**50% off P22’s Audio / Font CDs**  
· William Caslon Experience with Calson remix font  
· Rod McKuen’s Beatsville with Beatsville dingbat font  
· Rod McKuen’s In Search of Eros with Stanyan Eros font  
· Futurismo Soundtrack with Dada font.

—  
To see all of the specials visit: [http://www.p22.com/specialholidaysale.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20060525034923/http:/www.p22.com/specialholidaysale.html)  
—
author: Miss Tiffany
